Service Details: - Provides support for youth between the ages of 9-24 who are in and from care- Youth can have a voice, form friendships, and learn about health living while being involved in fun outings and activities- Promotes the views and opinions of youth in/from care- Promotes the improvement of conditions for youth in/from care- Promotes services for youth leaving care from the ages 18-24- Researches and reports on the needs specific to youth in/from care- Educates the public on these issues- Encourages support and friendship for youth in/from care
Dates: Every 2nd and 4th Thu of the month
How to Apply: For additional information contact the office by phone or email
Address & Map: 2604 Enterprise Way, #8Kelowna, BC     V1X 7Y5View MapQuest Map
